data.title: Norwich Film Festival
data.meta_description: Introducing the NFF2023 Official Selectionâ¦ Featuring 124 short films from 26 countries, screening in Norwich this November. View the full â¦
data.text:
_elicit_

British

A crossword maker. A librarian. 40 years of marriage, memories and tangled lives. But isolation changes people: will they remember who they once were?

A90

British

Annette lives a discontented life working in a road-side cafe. When Morgan enters, the pair are inevitably drawn into an intense romantic attraction.

And So It Was

Documentary

After the loss of her sister, Norah MacRae â the longest serving post office worker in Scottish history â reflects on her remaining years.

Apostles of Cinema

Documentary

Three devoted film workers in Tanzania reintroduce a classic piece of the countryâs film history to their audience of working class cinephiles.

Argh!

East Anglian

A novel new wellness craze promises to help people vent their worldly frustrations. Itâs certainly worked for Alderbrookâ¦ For now, anyway.

BETTER

British

A young woman is surprised to see her chronically ill sister has a new life.

Birdnesting

Student

Iris lives in a âbirdnestâ: her divorced parents alternate living in the family home. Cracks in this altruistic arrangement are starting to emerge.

Blue Hour

Student

Two journeys intersect when a photographer is hired for a last minute portrait gig. The unfolding session leaves an indelible mark on both women.

Bridge

British

Receptionist Bridget grapples with heartbreak, motherhood and a crumbling healthcare system. Her life changes when she picks up the phone to Kirsty.

Broken Gargoyles

British

The First World War is over. Britain is victorious, but for the casualties of war the fight for a normal life is far from over.

Bury the Dogs

British

A coming of age drama about the vulnerability of masculinity, the cracks that form in childhood friendships, and the frailty of father figures.

Cataract

International

A woman robs a gas station with her nearly-blind younger brother in order to pay for his cataract surgery.

Ceres

East Anglian

A daughter seeks refuge from her emotionally abusive partner at the home of her estranged mother.

Charge

Animation

In an energy-scarce dystopia, an old destitute man breaks into a battery factory but soon finds himself confronted by a deadly security droid.

Clause

East Anglian

Against the backdrop of Section 28, in a school attacked for its equality policies, what happens when the headteacher of the school is a gay man?

Corvine

Animation

An eccentric boy has trouble fitting in at school due to his obsession with crows.

Date with Death

Student

Depressed and recently widowed, Liv agrees to a blind date, but when she turns up sheâs greeted by Death himself. Surely, she wonât go home with him?

Death of The Gods

Student

The story of a hug. A boyâs journey across a surreal world to find his fallen giant.

Desire Lines

Documentary

A filmmaker observes people walking on desire lines and notices peoplesâ tendency to cut corners. What does this mean for the future of our planet?

DogFriend

International

A date takes an unexpected turn in this meditation on race, politics and history in Germany.

DÃºn Laoghaire

International

A dance of death between a mother and daughter ignites when the daughter tries to install a new stove in her motherâs house in DÃºn Laoghaire, Ireland.

Eat It

British

Break ups are hard to swallow. A gut busting comedy with heartbreak and cherry pie at its core.

EL FUNERAL

International

Venezuelan-American siblings in NYC cannot attend their grandfatherâs funeral due to their home countryâs collapse, so they decide to attend online.

Everybody Diesâ¦ Sometimes

British

A dark comedy about death anxiety that follows Mara as she grapples with the belief that she has killed everybody sheâs gotten close to.

Everything At Once

International

Youâve heard it before; that a moment can change your life. As if itâs possible to point to a single instance when things changed.

Filho

Student

Tomas Ponsteen was adopted from Brazil and doesnât desire to seek out his biological mother. Is it a moral duty of every adoptee to search for theirs?

Finding Alaa

Documentary

The father of an ISIS terrorist responsible for the 2015 Paris Attacks looks for his granddaughter, Alaa, believed to be in a Syrian refugee camp.

Fish Eye

International

A group of young filmmakers use a fish named Oddvar in their production, but they begin to question the morality of filming a helpless animal.

Fishlike

1 Minute Movie

Donât you feel like your whole life has already been written? Follow the life of a mackerel from the ocean to its packaging in a supermarket.

For my son

Student

In our world where buying and owning is synonymous with happiness, a mother struggles to buy a video game console for her sonâs Christmas present.

Good Boy

British

Out of money and out of luck, Danny attempts to rob a bank with the help of his anarchic mum, Jackie.

Grill

International

Inspired by true events: Tara is denied electricity bill support by Social Services, who tells her to simply get a free grill instead.

HEART FRUIT

International

Late summer heats up the city where people search for their own form of love.

Her Scents of Pu Er

Documentary

The first woman tea master in Chinaâs history takes us on a sensorial journey steeped in history as she unveils the secrets of Pu Er tea.

Homegrown

British

On the hottest day of the year, Barbadian fruit pickers Nicole and Vincent endure exploitative conditions on a UK fruit farm. Inspired by true events.

Homemaker

Student

Renee loses herself in a controlling relationship and the abuse she suffers gets worse until she is utterly trapped.

Horologist

Animation

Obsessed with time, Sand found a way to sell time itself. While his rich customers stay young, they never question the source of their youth.

Hugging

Animation

When you hug people goodbye after a social event, there is always that moment when they squeeze you more forcefully than before.

Icelandic Poppies

International

Agnesâ therapist recommends she grows Icelandic Poppies to calm her anxiety. In the process she unexpectedly befriends the young gardener, Asmund.

Iâm On Fire

International

Dannyâs twelve, drifting into adolescence and just getting interested in girls. He spends his days making mixtapes that he trades with his cousin.

In love and sorrow

Student

Is it possible to see the future in what surrounds us now? Two dutch couples, sixty years apart in age, discuss the past, present and future.

In the Shadow of Palms

Documentary

An intimate portrait of three lives on the outskirts of LA. A father, mother and son tell their stories of struggle and hope in the concrete jungle.

Inappropriate

East Anglian

When a volunteer turns up for his shift to help guide a young offender through the process of his arrest, he gets more than he bargained for.

Indefinitely

British

What happens when the Disability Allowance you were awarded indefinitely is stopped? A scathing look at the benefit system for the disabled in the UK.

Iron, Butterfly

Student

To catch up with work, a burdened rural blacksmith decides not to visit his wife, who works in the city. A visit from an artist alters his outlook.

Itching

British

Shot on 16mm film, Itching tells the story of a lonely young mudlark with an itch she just canât scratch.

Itâs Dog To Make A Houseplant If Youâre Sandwich

British

In an anonymous suburbia of the near future, a man becomes increasingly perplexed as people around him vanish â surely things canât get any worse?

Jellyfish and Lobster

British

Two elderly, terminally ill patients discover a magical pool that brings youth, forcing them to reconcile with the inescapable truth of mortality.

Just A Weekend

Student

A question of power and relationships when a mother comes to stay for the weekend, pitching a couple against each other with consequences.

Linda

British

Linda gets a job in a post office, but her tall tales soon raise suspicions.

Lobo

International

Life goes on and change is inevitable â a fact that Aline must accept upon returning to Brazil, following deportation from the UK.

LUNA

British

Scared of losing her job, a prickly young care worker must get help from a cowardly school boy to move a corpse.

Matterhorn

Student

Two estranged sisters reconnect during their stay in Switzerland where terminally ill Maggie plans to end her life by means of assisted suicide.

Measure

British

The horror of Jenâs teenage past catches up with her when she takes her autistic son to a birthday party in her home town.

Mother

International

Amidst the MH17 disaster, a miner on the Ukraine/Russian border discovers a ringing phone â and tragically so much more â in his backyard.

Muna

British

A British-Somali teen is desperate to escape the monotony of her household, but when tragedy strikes she must navigate a confusing mourning period.

Night

Animation

Night brings peace and sleep to all the people in the broken town. Only the eyes of the mother of the missing child stay resilient.

Odd One Out

Animation

A cycle of prejudice is broken when one ostracised outsider breaks the pattern with rebellious celebration.

Original Skin

British

In an alternate world where having sex means swapping bodies with the other person, a young woman struggles to be herself.

Out of the Fog

International

On Christmas Eve, Annie receives a phone call from her long lost daughter. She has only a few minutes to find out where she is and save herâ¦

Out Of The Grey

British

A pregnant environmental refugee is forced to leave her haven in the hope to find medical support and safety for her unborn baby.

Pablo, Honey!

British

Emma starts dating the poltergeist who haunts her flat. She struggles to resolve her impending eviction with the ghostâs increasing possessiveness.

Pacemaker

Animation

An animated musical about a widower awaiting a Pacemaker to save his life who gets a second chance at true love by accepting his grandsonâs identity.

Patricia in the Dark

Documentary

Born before the word âtransgenderâ existed, Patricia spent most of her life longing for love and acceptance but too afraid to reveal her true self.

Picturesque

British

A young blind woman and her girlfriend navigate the ups and downs of their inter-able relationship, learning how to embrace love and disability.

Pillow Chocolate

British

For trans man Jamie, a one-night stand is more than just sex, itâs a question of self-worth.

Please Hold the Line

International

A young scam call operator is thrust into a moral dilemma as she navigates a life-changing situation.

Puffling

Documentary

On a remote Icelandic island, teenagers trade late night parties for puffin rescues in this coming-of-age story for young adults and puffins alike.

Record. Play. Stop.

Student

We follow a lone probe as it collects music amongst the infinite fields of sounds, in a quest to find its place among the stars.

RED SOIL

Documentary

We follow the family of Mama, a Nigerian elder, as they prepare for her funeral, offering an insight into the Edo Stateâs perspective on death.

Repair

British

Ramin, who is on the spectrum, repairs electronics in his shop, but an embarrassing encounter with Marc at a store forces him to confront himself.

SAFE

British

When an office cleaner finishes work in the evening, all she wants is to get the bus home. Instead, sheâs harassed by a man at the bus stop.

Salmon

International

A budding young chef driven by audacious dreams is bestowed with a rare chance at a prestigious restaurant.

Samovar

British

After Raoul Wallenberg disappeared into the Soviet prison system, Samovar is a poetic imagining of his survival and defiance of a brutal world.

See It Say It

British

A struggling actor receives a last-minute call for a life-changing audition. But what starts as a routine journey quickly morphs into a nightmareâ¦

Seeing Read

East Anglian

Zoey is plunged into stress when she texts Miles, the guy she likes, to ask him out on a date, and is left âon readâ. A comedic take on modern dating.

Sheephead

International

Frankie discovers that a long-time acquaintance has possibly died and fixates on an unfinished transaction with the man.

Skewered

British

Opposing sexual appetites & dietary ethics bring a relationship to a surprising crescendo as a heartfelt revelation confronts the elephant in the room.

Spicy Pink Tea

British

In reverence to the British paintings that watch over her from inside a stately home, a young girl aspires to become the perfect upper-class lady.

Spoor

British

Stuck caring for her vitriolic, dementia-ridden mother, Ash has a lump that grows until it erupts, spewing a mysterious substance.

Static Focus

Student

Our story follows Stevie, a man with a TV for a head but without a remote to help, as they struggle to get through their day at work.

Stop Dead

British

City detectives try to stop a dishevelled girl staggering down the middle of a country road. But if you stop moving, you die.

Take Care

East Anglian

Two care-workers, who barely interact outside of their weekly handover, must come together to face insurmountable challenges.

Taking the Bus to Mount Olympus

Animation

A celebrated actress is chosen to be filmed and visit a society where people donât talk nor eat and are reduced to almost no individualities.

TASTE

British

Jane marries and moves into her new home but later discovers her husband is keeping more than a few skeletons in his closet.

That Workmanâs Arm

International

A debt collector is sent to stand over a woman with inherited debt but is thrown off balance by her and the two of them discover a connection.

The Archive: Queer Nigerians

British

Queer Nigerians in the UK gather to tell their stories, documenting their experiences so that they can never be erased again.

The Ballerina

International

A policewoman, dedicated to her work, gives unpleasant information to a woman who immediately forgets about it.

The Bond

Student

Pregnant and incarcerated, Aria fights for her most precious connection against a system designed to isolate her.

The Creators

Student

In another dimension, the Creators are working on a project, getting closer to a result. But creating something can be hard work, even for them.

The Final Nail In The Coffin

Animation

A mother and son are stuck. A father is obsessing over a plank of wood in his living room. A businessman is looking for a lost hammer.

The Foul

British

Someone has to do something about all that dog sh*t. A corporate public information film about the importance of cleaning up after your dog.

The Girl with the Haunted Vagina

British

Sexually repressed Meghan desperately tries to reach climax but is thwarted at every turn by the ghost that haunts her vagina (no, really).

The Girlsâ Room

British

Set in the bedroom shared by three sisters in their teens, we follow them over the course of a transformative summer.

The Golden West

British

Two Irish sisters seek their fortunes in the gold rush. With nothing to show for their efforts, their age-old feud soon threatens to become deadly.

The Guest

Student

Two waiters in a Shanghai restaurant try to please a rich guest only to find out that he is not who he seems.

The Old Young Crow

International

An Iranian boy befriends an old Japanese woman at a graveyard in Tokyo.

The One Note Man

British

A bassoonist, whose only job was to play a single note, hears a breathtaking solo played by a beautiful violinist, changing his life forever.

The Red Suitcase

International

A veiled 16-year-old Iranian teenager arrives at the airport by herself â a life changing decision awaits.

The Scottish Play

Documentary

A theatre group staged a production so disastrous it made international headlines. 40 years later, a filmmaker tries to figure out what really happened.

The Secret Diary of a High-Rise

Animation

The brief memoirs of a high-rise tower block, finding itâs way in the big city.

The Snip

British

Tony and Lindsay are looking for a permanent solution to their familyâs fertility, but for Tony, the simple procedure threatens his masculinity.

The Whole World Blind (or: The Ballad of The Cuck and The Eunuch)

British

After his wifeâs affair, a humiliated businessman flees to the countryside, encounters a reclusive war veteran, and strikes a pact to take revenge.

The Wyrm of Bwlch Pen Barras

British

Early one winter morning in the rural town of Rhuthun in North Wales, three men are called upon once again to carry out a terrible assignment.

Things Unheard Of

International

A little Kurdish girl tries to put a smile back on her grandmotherâs face after the disappearance of her television, her only window into the world.

Thoughts of a young person at the sight of a dissolving world

Documentary

A young actor travels to the Arctic to film an environmental thriller but sees the climate crisis and asks himself what world we will leave behind.

Three Sisters

Documentary

A filmmaker returns to places where he had made a film about suicide. Now, he searches for the reasons three sisters ended their lives together.

To the Brink

Student

A stop motion cabaret for the cynical and depraved. Guilt, alcoholic apathy and the inevitable apocalypse threaten to push a young man to the brink.

Tomato Kitchen

Animation

The dark truth of the Tomato Kitchen along with Leeâs hidden past gets revealed by an accident that interrupts hi dinner with his colleagues.

Visible Mending

Animation

A short animated documentary about love, death, and knitting.

Waving

British

An unflinchingly honest portrayal of the devastating reality behind OCD, following a father in self-imposed exile.

We Are Nature

Documentary

Interviews taken from BPoC women outdoor activists who are changing the story, acknowledging trauma and inspiring a new lens on the British outdoors.

Where the Sun Always Shines

Documentary

Climate threat causes a local filmmaker to turn the lens towards their hometown at risk of being underwater for a bittersweet depiction of life.

Winner Fights The Moon

British

Having never met his daughter Riley outside of a prison visitation room, Arris is desperate to make up for lost time and reconnect.

Yellow

British

In Taliban-controlled Afghanistan, a woman walks into a chadari store in Kabul to buy her first full-body veil and face an uncertain future.
